title: The Unprofessional
description: Attribution based on behaviour that does not conform to the one expected by the team. Usually considered unintentional.

title: Ego is the enemy
description: Attribution formed based on egoistical attitude and behaviour of a person, which often overshadows the efforts of the other members and might even be offensive in more serious cases.

title: L'Ã‰tranger
description: This Persona represents a person detached and disengaged from the activities of a meeting. They are usually not as involved as other participants and therefore, stand out for their distance.

title: The Loner
description: A loner is a person that seems to be operating in a more solitary manner and rises therefore questions regarding their engagement, involvement and personality.

title: The Underperformer
description: Attributions related to this persona are usually made with the goal of explaining this person's lack of performance or a tendency to perform in a poorer manner.

title: Hiding and not seeking
description: Attributions regarding this persona are made as the PLs notice a tendency to not openly approach the virtual setting.

title: Distraction Monster
description: Attributions of this persona relate to the lack of focus one might exhibit during team meeting activities.
